title: Apron, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft loops
description: Apron made from a panel of fabric patterned with a strip of bold flowers and narrow, widely spaced bands of blue, green, white, and yellow on black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Apron, late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft loops. Gift of Daren Pierce. 1982-79-16.
